title: Da Angela
typeOfFood: Pizza, Italian, Salad bar, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small Italian family restaurant with a cozy atmosphere. Menu does not list vegan items, but does offer, on demand, different vegan dishes, such as pizza with vegankase, pasta, and salad. The owner looks after the guests and is knowledgeable about veganism.
